Landing-Title: KNV HELPS YOUR BUISNESS SCALE TO 6 & 7 FIGURES
About-Heading: KNV, meaning Kristijan and Viktor, is a social media marketing agency (SMMA).
About-Paragraph-1: We are young and ambitious enterprenurs who want to make a change in the Digtial Marketing area. We want to help other like-minded individuals expand their reach online and scale their buisness.
About-Paragraph-2: Kristijan Sotirovski - Digital Marketing (Social Media, SEO, PPC, Affiliate Marketing), George Mason University (GMU), Google certificate for Digital Marketing.
About-Paragraph-3: Viktor Trajkovski - Graphic Design (Logo Design, Web Design, Motion Graphics), Music Producer, Content Creator, European University Skopje, Macedonia, Google certificate for Digital Marketing.
How-It-Works-Title-Line-1: YOU GIVE US AN IDEA. WE CREATE A STRATEGY.
How-It-Works-Title-Line-2: WE CREATE A DESIGN. YOU CREATE REVENUE.
How-It-Works-Paragraph-1: We deliver creative content that resonates with your customers.
How-It-Works-Paragraph-2-Line-1: Our service uses various social media platforms to attract more customers
How-It-Works-Paragraph-2-Line-2: to your profile, product or business.
